title: Best of The Herd: 07/30/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 07/30/2019
description:
Colin thinks Zeke's hold out has played right into Jerry Jones hands and he explains why.  He predicts the Saints will crumble after last year's devastating ending to the season and miss the playoffs.  Plus, former NFL QB Michael Vick explains what Lamar Jackson needs to do to be successful and why Quarterbacks have to carry themselves differently than the rest of the team  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
